ResearchProjectDef.description: Having studied what's left of survival guide you've found, you got the basic concepts of how to survive in the harsh enviroment around you. Having no advanced tools or materials, you'll have to make your own, from the very basic one.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic farming
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to grow simple domestic plants.

ResearchProjectDef.label: butchering
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to process animal corpses.

ResearchProjectDef.label: animal husbandry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to tame and control wild animals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: carpentry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you perform elaborate wooden carving to make wooden trade crafts and base for tools and weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: masonry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to cut stone chunks into blocks and allows you perform elaborate stone carving to make stone trade crafts and sharp blades.

ResearchProjectDef.label: tannery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft apparel and various stuff from animal hides.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bone carving
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you perform elaborate bone carving to make bone trade crafts and sharp blades.

ResearchProjectDef.label: pottery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to make ceramics out of clay.
